panels.visual: Val in courier tunnels Passages flowing smoothly New shortcuts appearing
panels.dialogue: Halfling Courier: "Val! The tunnels are amazing now! We can reach places we never could before!"

characters.Val: Height: Just under 7 feet tall Build: Lean and athletic, with the wiry strength of a monk Scales: Warm brass/copper-bronze color with a subtle metallic sheen that catches light Simple monastery robes in earth tones (browns, tans) Robes have subtle wear marks and chalk dust from courier work

panels.visual: Pocky in observatory Stars visible and bright
panels.dialogue: Marge: "The celestial essence is stronger! Think of what we can learn!"

characters.Marge: Age: Middle-aged human woman (40s-50s) Height: 5'4" Build: Slightly stooped from years of reading Modest scholar's robes in muted colors Ink-stained everywhere - fingers, sleeves, hem

panels.visual: Lunara in garden Plants flourishing Marivielle beside her
panels.dialogue: Marivielle: "The garden remembers your kindness, dear." Lunara: "The balance is different, but it's still balance."

panels.visual: Malrik in marketplace Drow from embassy approaching
panels.dialogue: Drow Diplomat: "You saved us from Alric's manipulation. The embassy thanks you." Malrik: "Just promise to seek change through honest means."
